text: geudaedeul-eun yagob-ege jug-eum-i chaj-awass-eul ttae hamkke iss-eossdeon jadeul-inga? geuga geuui jasondeul-ege malhani “na ihue geudaedeul-eun mueos-eul gyeongbaehal geos-inga?” geudeul-i malhagil “jeohuineun dangsin-ui sin, geuligo dangsin-ui josang-in abeulahamgwa iseuma-elgwa isag-ui sin-eul yuilsin-euloseo gyeongbaehal geos-ibnida. jeohuineun geubunkke bogjonghaneun jadeul-ibnida.”
